translation.English: to lose weight / to become thin
translation.Burmese: အဆီကျသည် / ပိန်ခြင်း

meanings.part_of_speech: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

kanji_explanation: The first kanji means thin or emaciated and it carries the idea of losing flesh or weight. In そうしん this kanji emphasizes a slim, slender body as a desirable or descriptive trait. In やせがた it marks the characteristic of being thin, describing body type rather than action.

explanations.explanation: The word "やせる" means to lose weight or to become slender. It refers to the process of reducing one's body weight, typically by losing fat. This word is used to describe when someone becomes thinner or more slim through dieting, exercise, or naturally over time.
explanations.youtube_description: Embark on a linguistic journey with "痩せる" (やせる) in Japanese! Learn how to cleverly incorporate this versatile term into your daily dialogues and understand its various contexts. Ideal for learners eager to enhance their Japanese communication skills. Stay tuned for more insightful tips!
explanations.motivation: Today's focus is the versatile term "やせる," frequently heard in discussions about health, fitness, and self-care routines.
collocations: やせるためにダイエットする
やせるように運動する
explanations.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonym of the word "やせる" is "げんりょう". While "やせる" directly refers to losing weight and becoming thin, "げんりょう" focuses more on the act of reducing weight or shedding pounds generally, often implying a more conscious effort or plan, such as dieting.
explanations.antonyms_explanation: The most common antonym of the word "やせる" is "ふとる". While "やせる" means to become thin or lose weight, "ふとる" means to gain weight or become fat, indicating an increase in body size or mass, often through overnutrition or lack of exercise.

examples.kanji: 私は痩せるためにダイエットします。
examples.furigana: 私は(わたしは)痩せ(やせ)るためにダイエットします。

translation.Japanese: 私は痩せるためにダイエットします。
translation.English: I go on a diet to lose weight.
translation.Persian: من برای لاغر شدن رژیم می‌گیرم.
translation.Nepali: म तौल घटाउनको लागि डाइट गर्छु।
translation.Indonesian: Saya diet untuk menurunkan berat badan.
translation.Vietnamese: Tôi ăn kiêng để giảm cân.
translation.Burmese: ကျွန်ုပ်သည်ဝိတ်ကျရန်အတွက် ဟင်းသီးဟင်းရွက်စားခြင်းပြုလုပ်သည်။
translation.Korean: 저는 살 빼기 위해 다이어트를 합니다.
translation.Hindi: मैं पतला होने के लिए डाइट करता हूँ।
translation.French: Je fais un régime pour perdre du poids.
translation.Bengali: আমি ওজন কমানোর জন্য ডায়েট করি।

examples.kanji: 私は痩せるように運動します。
examples.furigana: 私(わたし)は痩(や)せるように運動(うんどう)します。

translation.Japanese: 私は痩せるように運動します。
translation.Persian: من برای لاغر شدن ورزش می‌کنم.
translation.Nepali: म वजन घटाउनको लागि व्यायाम गर्छु।
translation.Indonesian: Saya berolahraga untuk menurunkan berat badan.
translation.Vietnamese: Tôi tập thể dục để giảm cân.
translation.Burmese: အလေးချိန်ချိန်ရန် လေ့ကျင့်ခန်းပြုလုပ်သည်။
translation.Hindi: मैं वजन घटाने के लिए व्यायाम करता/करती हूँ।
translation.French: Je fais de l'exercice pour maigrir.
translation.Bengali: আমি ওজন কমানোর জন্য ব্যায়াম করি।

examples.kanji: 痩せると気分がいいです。
examples.furigana: 痩(や)せると気分(きぶん)がいいです。

translation.Japanese: 痩せると気分がいいです。
translation.English: I feel good when I lose weight.
translation.Persian: وقتی وزن کم می‌کنم، احساس خوبی دارم.
translation.Indonesian: Saya merasa baik ketika saya menurunkan berat badan.
translation.Filipino: Maginhawa ang pakiramdam ko kapag pumayat ako.
translation.Vietnamese: Tôi cảm thấy tốt khi giảm cân.
translation.Burmese: အလေးချိန့်လျော့ချရင် ကျေနပ်ပါတယ်။
translation.Hindi: वजन कम करने पर अच्छा महसूस होता है।
translation.French: Je me sens bien quand je perds du poids.
translation.Spanish: Me siento bien cuando pierdo peso.
translation.Chinese: 瘦下来的时候，感觉很好。

examples.kanji: 彼女は、やせたのを喜んだ。
examples.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)は、やせたのを喜(よろこ)んだ。

translation.Japanese: 彼女は、やせたのを喜んだ。
translation.English: She was happy about losing weight.
translation.Persian: او از اینکه وزن کم کرده خوشحال بود.
translation.Filipino: Natutuwa siya sa pagbawas ng timbang.
translation.Vietnamese: Cô ấy vui mừng vì giảm cân.
translation.Burmese: သူမသည် အလေးချိန်ကျသောကြောင့် ဝမ်းမြောက်ခဲ့သည်။
translation.Hindi: वह वजन कम होने से खुश थी।
translation.French: Elle était contente d'avoir perdu du poids.
translation.Spanish: Ella estaba contenta de haber perdido peso.

examples.furigana: 彼(かれ)はやせ始(はじ)めた。

translation.Persian: او شروع به کاهش وزن کرد.
translation.Vietnamese: Anh ấy đã bắt đầu giảm cân.
translation.Burmese: သူသည် ကိုယ်အလေးချိန် လျော့ကျ လာသည်။

meanings.part_of_speech: Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Intransitive verb
Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
